summary: This cable discusses the difficulty of obtaining a Mexican visa through official channels due to bureaucratic delays and concerns about Cuban immigrants becoming public charges. It suggests alternative methods, such as using high-level Mexican contacts or Cuban friends with connections, and coordinating with the LITEMPO visa channel. The cable also advises on handling inquiries from the Mexican consul in Miami and using a CINODACID cover role.
title: IN 47827: Obtaining Mexican Visa for AMBANG/1
